verses.roman:
vāṭite kata śata vṛkṣe lakṣa lakṣa phala
tathāpi śunena yathā miṣṭa nārikela

synonyms: vāṭite—in his garden; kata śata—how many hundreds of; vṛkṣe—trees; lakṣa lakṣa phala—millions of fruits; tathāpi—still; śunena—hears; yathā—where; miṣṭa nārikela—sweet coconut.
translation: "Although he already has hundreds of trees and millions of fruits, he is still very eager to hear about the place where sweet coconut is available.
